resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106798</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106798</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202782</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Examining effective openers and closures in writings</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Überprüfende wirkungsvolle Öffner und Schliessen
in den Schreiben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ouvreurs et fermetures pertinents examinants dans 
les écritures</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Openers e fechamentos eficazes examinando nas 
escritas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Apri e chiusure efficaci esaminanti nelle 
scritture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξέταση των αποτελεσματικών ανοιχτηριών και των 
περατώσεων στις γραφές</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Abrelatas y encierros eficaces que examinan en 
escrituras</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will listen to a reading of Dr. Seuss' and Jack Prelutsky's "Hooray for Difendoofer Day!" Students will then work cooperatively to edit one another's rough drafts of analytical essay, focusing on openers and closures.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer hören zu einem Messwert von Dr. 
Seuss' und Jack Prelutskys "von Hooray für Difendoofer Tag!" 
Kursteilnehmer arbeiten dann kooperativ, um Entwürfe einen des 
analytischen Versuchs zu bearbeiten eines anderen rauhe und 
konzentrieren auf Öffner und Schliessen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants écouteront une lecture de Dr. 
Seuss'et Hooray de Jack Prelutsky de "pour le jour de Difendoofer!" 
Les étudiants travailleront alors coopérativement pour éditer
les ébauches rugueuses de chacun de l'essai analytique, se 
concentrant sur des ouvreurs et des fermetures.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes escutarão uma leitura do Dr. Seuss' 
e Hooray de Jack Prelutsky do "para o dia de Difendoofer!" Os 
estudantes trabalharão então cooperativa para editar os esboços um 
ásperos another's do essay analítico, focalizando em openers e em 
fechamentos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi ascolteranno una lettura del Dott. 
Seuss e di Hooray del Jack Prelutsky "per il giorno di Difendoofer!" 
Gli allievi allora lavoreranno in cooperazione per stampare le 
brutte copie di massima di un altro una del saggio analitico, mettendo
a fuoco sugli apri e sulle chiusure.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα ακούσουν μια ανάγνωση του Δρ Seuss'
και Hooray του Jack Prelutsky's "για την ημέρα 
Difendoofer!" Οι σπουδαστές θα εργαστούν έπειτα 
συνεταιριστικά για να επιμεληθούν τα του άλλου τραχιά σχέδια ένα
του αναλυτικού δοκίμιου, που εστιάζει στα ανοιχτήρια και τις 
περατώσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes escucharán una lectura del Dr. 
Seuss y Hooray de Gato Prelutsky de "para el día de Difendoofer!" 
Los estudiantes entonces trabajarán cooperativo para corregir 
los bosquejos ásperos de otra persona uno del ensayo analítico, 
centrándose en los abrelatas y los encierros.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

        </lifeCycle>

        </metaMetadata>

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
